name: UpdateWebset
description:
Update details of an existing webset.

Use this tool to update the information of a specific webset identified by its ID. Ideal for modifying webset attributes when changes are needed.

parameters.name: webset_id
parameters.description: The unique id or externalId of the Webset to be updated. Ensure it matches a valid Webset.

value_schema.description: The id or externalId of the Webset

parameters.name: webset_details
parameters.description: A JSON object containing the details to update for the webset. This includes any attributes that need to be changed.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the exa API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id or externalId of the Webset

value_schema.description: The id or externalId of the Webset
